content: So whether you're Baker Hughes oilfield or ABB Information Systems or the Defense Logistics Agency or many others, these big organizations, let alone the 60% net new customers, their acceleration to move to a platform that they're looking at not for 1 year, 2 year, 3 years, they're looking 5, 10 years out in their decisions that they're making here and they're looking for that scalable cloud platform, so I see it as a positive, but it is certainly an accelerated shift.
